title: Trump arrives at courthouse in D.C. for arraignment in DOJ election case
description: Former President Donald Trump has arrived in a federal courthouse in Washington, D.C., on charges related to his attempt to overturn the results of the 2020 presidential election.

title: Jury acquits a white Louisiana trooper caught on camera beating a Black motorist
description: The federal jury acquitted a state trooper charged with violating the civil rights of Aaron Bowman despite body-camera footage that showed the officer pummeling him 18 times with a flashlight.

title: Post Malone bought Magic: The Gathering's 'One Ring' card valued as high as $2 million
description: The American rapper and singer is a hardcore fan of the collectible trading card game who bought its most valuable card for $800,000 last year. His latest purchase may be worth double that price.

title: Bud Light boycott takes fizz out of brewer's earnings
description: The company lost big sales in the U.S. after the boycotts over its collaboration with a transgender influencer. CEO says things have now stabilized "with signals of improvement" for the brand.

title: A new take on 'Pride and Prejudice' brings readers to 2000s New York Chinatown
description: By recasting the Bennets as a Cantonese, working-class immigrant family, C.K. Chau hopes to fill a gap in the Pride and Prejudice canon.

title: The latest Trump indictment lists 6 unnamed co-conspirators. Here's what we know
description: Despite prosecutors listing six of his alleged co-conspirators, Trump will be standing alone in Washington, D.C.'s federal courthouse in his first court appearance since being indicted Tuesday.

title: Up First briefing: Trump's arraignment; Lizzo sued; Republicans on climate change
description: Donald Trump is expected to be arraigned on charges in connected to the Jan. 6 riot today. Three of Lizzo's former dancers sue her for harassment. The GOP prioritizes the economy over climate change.

title: Lori Vallow Daybell is facing extradition on conspiracy murder charges in Arizona
description: Lori Vallow Daybell's previous husband was killed in Arizona months before her two youngest children were murdered in Idaho. Now, prosecutors are looking to extradite Vallow Daybell to Arizona.

title: Petting other people's dogs, even briefly, can boost your health
description: You don't even have to own one. Research shows just 5 to 20 minutes interacting with other people's pooches can reduce stress hormones and increase well-being.

title: That's cold: Three-quarters of Republicans prioritize the economy over climate change
description: In the latest NPR/PBS NewsHour/Marist poll, the record temperatures this summer don't have Republicans heated as confidence in institutions takes a hit and President Biden has challenges ahead.

title: Jonathan Majors' trial on assault and harassment charges begins in New York
description: Last March, the actor was arrested after an alleged domestic dispute. He pleaded not guilty to four counts. He has starred in films including Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania and Creed III.

title: Post Malone chases happiness, chicken nuggets and love in new album 'Austin'
description: Hip-hop superstar Post Malone shares stories of fatherhood, self-doubt and why he named his latest album after his real name.

title: After the East Palestine train derailment, are railroads any safer?
description: Change is coming to the rail industry in the U.S. — but whether it's for the better or worse depends on who you ask.

title: What a beach vacation looks like for President Biden
description: When you're the president, vacation involves secret service, coordination with police, crowds of people watching you on the beach and the possibility that at any moment the job will come calling.

title: Texas Medicaid dropped more than 500,000 enrollees in one month
description: Medicaid is shedding enrollees for the first time since the pandemic started. But rolls in some states are shrinking much faster than in others. Nearly 4 million people have lost coverage so far.

title: Texas Medicaid drops 82% of its enrollees since April
description: Medicaid is shedding enrollees for the first time since the pandemic started. But rolls in some states are shrinking much faster than in others. Nearly 4 million people have lost coverage so far.

title: Woman's escape from cinder block cell likely spared others from same fate, FBI says
description: A woman who escaped her kidnapper by punching her way out of a homemade cell in southern Oregon likely saved other women from a similar fate, authorities said.

title: Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and his wife announce their separation
description: Justin Trudeau is the 51-year-old scion of one of Canada's most famous politicians. Sophie Trudeau is a former model and TV host. Together, they brought star power to the prime minister's office.

title: Former NPR President and U.S. Ambassador Delano Lewis has died at 84
description: Lewis was named president of NPR in 1993, becoming the first Black person to take the role. He came to the job with a long resume from his time in Washington politics and business circles.
